# Samples Docs

- [Windows Communication Foundation Samples](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/index.md): Download Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) samples for .NET Framework. The samples provide instruction on various aspects of WCF.

## AJAX

- [AJAX](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/ajax.md): Learn more about: AJAX
- [JSONP](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/jsonp.md): Learn more about: JSONP
- [JSON Serialization](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/json-serialization.md): Learn more about: DataContractJsonSerializer sample
- [Basic AJAX Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/basic-ajax-service.md): Learn more about: Basic AJAX Service
- [AJAX Service Using HTTP POST](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/ajax-service-using-http-post.md): Learn more about: AJAX Service Using HTTP POST
- [AJAX Service Without Configuration](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/ajax-service-without-configuration.md): Learn more about: AJAX Service Without Configuration
- [AJAX Service Using Complex Types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/ajax-service-using-complex-types-sample.md): Learn more about: AJAX Service Using Complex Types Sample
- [AJAX Service with JSON and XML](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/ajax-service-with-json-and-xml-sample.md): Learn more about: AJAX Service with JSON and XML Sample

## Basic

- [Basic](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/basic.md): Learn more about: Basic
- [Getting Started](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/getting-started-sample.md): Learn how to implement a typical service and a typical client using WCF. This sample is the basis for all other basic technology samples.

## Basic Binding

- [Basic Binding](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/basic-binding.md): Learn more about: Basic Binding
- [Message Security Sample](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/message-security-sample.md): Learn more about: Message Security Sample
- [BasicBinding with Transport Security](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/basicbinding-with-transport-security.md): Learn more about: BasicBinding with Transport Security
- [BasicBinding](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/basicbinding.md): Learn more about: BasicBinding

## Behavior Security

- [Behavior Security](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/behavior-security.md): Learn more about: Behavior Security
- [Service Auditing Behavior](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/service-auditing-behavior.md): Learn more about: Service Auditing Behavior
- [Membership and Role Provider](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/membership-and-role-provider.md): Learn about a sample that demonstrates how a service can use the ASP.NET membership and role providers to authenticate and authorize clients.
- [Authorizing Access to Service Operations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/authorizing-access-to-service-operations.md): Learn more about: Authorizing Access to Service Operations
- [Impersonating the Client](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/impersonating-the-client.md): Learn more about: Impersonating the Client

## Behaviors

- [Behaviors](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/behaviors.md): Learn more about: Behaviors
- [Concurrency](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/concurrency.md): Learn more about: Concurrency
- [Default Service Behavior](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/default-service-behavior.md): Learn more about: Default Service Behavior
- [Instancing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/instancing.md): Learn more about: Instancing
- [Metadata Publishing Behavior](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/metadata-publishing-behavior.md): Learn more about: Metadata Publishing Behavior
- [Service Transaction Behavior](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/service-transaction-behavior.md): Learn more about a sample that demonstrates the use of a client-coordinated transaction and other settings to control service transaction behavior.
- [Service Debug Behavior](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/service-debug-behavior.md): Learn more about: Service Debug Behavior
- [Throttling](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/throttling.md): Learn more about: Throttling

## Binding

- [Binding](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/samples/binding.md): Learn more about the WCF samples for endpoint binding.
